items.name: Object_Text
items.content: # =================================================================== # # Script: Object_Text # # $$COPYRIGHT$$ # # =================================================================== class Object_Text extends gs.Object_Text # # The text to display. # @property text # @type string # @accessors "text", set: (v) -> if v != @text_ @text_ = v @needsUpdate = yes get: -> @text_ @accessors "visible", set: (v) -> if v != @visible_ @visible_ = v @needsUpdate = yes @fullRefresh() get: -> @visible_ and (!@parent or @parent.visible) ###* * A UI object to display text on screen. * * @module ui * @class Object_Text * @extends gs.Object_Text * @memberof ui * @constructor ### constructor: -> super() ###* * Indicates if that UI object will break the binding-chain. If true the UI object * will not change any binding-targets for the current binding-execution period. * @property breakBindingChain * @type boolean ### @breakBindingChain = no @dstRect = new ui.UIElementRectangle(this) @wordWrap = yes @controlsByStyle = new Array(ui.UIManager.stylesById.length) @styles = [] @activeStyles = [] @data = new Array(10) ###* * The UI object's padding. The default is { left: 0, top: 0, right: 0, bottom: 0 }. * @property padding * @type ui.Space ### @padding = new ui.Space(0, 0, 0, 0) ###* * The UI object's margin. The margin defines an extra space around the UI object. * The default is { left: 0, top: 0, right: 0, bottom: 0 }. * @property margin * @type Object ### @margin = new ui.Space(0, 0, 0, 0) ###* * An event-emitter to emit events. * @property events * @type gs.Component_EventEmitter ### @events = new gs.EventEmitter() @addComponent(@events) ui.Object_Text = Object_Text
